Articles.Content: I read the rules awhile ago when I first joined the forum, and I recall it saying that you are not allowed to post "first" on threads, but I see it happening on the daily kerbal. Why happened?

> 
> As long as there is other content besides "First", then it should be fine. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> And I'm sure that it is not the biggest problem our moderators face.

That's true. I guess it is just annoying to read over and over again, you know?

well, it's fun to be first.

I've also seen a mod once post "First!" ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Why are you complaining?? No rules?! Cm'on this is the most freedom you're gonna have on this forum anyways!

(The last sentence was a joke, in fact, they're were all one joke. I got you, you skrub).
